headline: UiPath Named a Leader and Star Performer in the Everest Group Full Suite Intelligent Process Automation Platform (IPAP) PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025
summary: NEW YORK, November 17, 2025--UiPath (NYSE: PATH), a global leader in agentic automation, today announced that it has been recognized as a Leader and Star Performer in the Everest Group Full Suite Intelligent Process Automation Platforms (IPAP) PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025. Additionally, UiPath was also named a Leader and positioned highest for Vision and Market Impact in the Everest Group Intelligent Process Automation Platform (IPAP) PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025.

headline: Gary Haase to Join Everest as EVP, CEO of Legacy Operations
summary: HAMILTON, Bermuda, November 17, 2025--Everest Group, Ltd. (NYSE: EG), a global underwriting leader providing world-class reinsurance and specialty insurance solutions, today announced the appointment of Gary Haase as Executive Vice President and CEO of Legacy Operations, effective December 1, 2025. He will report to Jim Williamson, Everest’s President and CEO, and will join the Company’s Executive Leadership Team.

raw.headline: Gary Haase to Join Everest as EVP, CEO of Legacy Operations

(NYSE: EG), a global underwriting leader providing world-class reinsurance and specialty insurance solutions, today announced the appointment of Gary Haase as Executive Vice President and CEO of Legacy Operations, effective December 1, 2025. He will report to Jim Williamson, Everest’s President and CEO, and will join the Company’s Executive Leadership Team.

headline: Does the Everest Group Stock Decline Offer an Opportunity After Recent Leadership Changes?
summary: Wondering if Everest Group is a hidden bargain or an overpriced pick? You are not alone, and digging into its valuation could unlock some interesting insights. Over the last year, the stock is down 10.6%, with a decline of 6.6% in the past month. It is still up more than 55% over five years. Headlines about Everest Group in recent weeks have focused on its strategic moves within the insurance industry and leadership updates, sparking debates around its future prospects...
